programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if RT audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o STKStifKarp.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1
ifrq = p4 kv1 line p6, p3, p7 ;Pickup Position kv2 = p5 ;String Sustain
asig STKStifKarp cpspch(p4), 1, 4, kv1, 11, kv2, 1, 10 outs asig, asig endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
i 1 0 2 5.00 0 100 100 i 1 + 40 5.00 127 1 127 i 1 10 32 5.00 127 1 10 e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
